name: Abathur
title: Evolution Master
description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

abilities.name: Symbiote
abilities.description: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.

abilities.name: Toxic Nest
abilities.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds. Stores up to 3 charges.

heroics.name: Ultimate Evolution
heroics.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

heroics.name: Evolve Monstrosity
heroics.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times. The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies. Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits. This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

original.name: Abathur
original.title: Evolution Master
original.description: Abathur, the Evolution Master of Kerrigan's Swarm, works ceaselessly to improve the zerg from the genetic level up. His hate for chaos and imperfection almost rivals his hatred of pronouns.
original.shortDescription: A unique Hero that can manipulate the battle from anywhere on the map.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

trait.name: Locust Strain
trait.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 25 seconds, have 316 health and deal 34 damage with each Basic Attack.

abilities.name: Symbiote
abilities.description: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.

abilities.name: Toxic Nest
abilities.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds. Stores up to 3 charges.

abilities.name: Deep Tunnel
abilities.description: Quickly tunnel to a visible location

skins.name: Evolution Master
skins.description: Abathur, the Evolution Master of Kerrigan's Swarm, works ceaselessly to improve the zerg from the genetic level up. His hate for chaos and imperfection almost rivals his hatred of pronouns.

skins.name: Swarm Abathur
skins.description: Evolution is a process that's unending. Survival requires adaptation. Even Abathur, a master of manipulating evolution itself, is no exception to this cardinal rule of nature.

skins.name: Skelethur Abathur
skins.description: Exoendoskeleton... logical next advancement. Secondary benefit, elicits fear in adolescent terrans. Useful.

skins.name: Pajamathur Abathur
skins.description: Upon occasion reality appears unsuitable. Desire for absence occurs. Inhibit ocular reception. Internally visualize. Possible for current location to alter. Make dreams come true.
